Translations.Text: (Arambha karaicho) parama karaunamaya parama dayalu allahara namata
sakalo dharanara hamada (prasansa) bisbajagatara raba allahara babe
ami kerala tomarae'i ibadata karaom, arau tomara ocarate'i sahayya praarthana karaom
te'omlokara patha, yisakalaka tumi niyamata (anugraha) pradana karaicha, yisakalara oparata tomara kraodha aha na'i arau yisakala pathabhrasta'o nahaya
